main event: A civilian reported observing a brilliant blue-white object through a radar scope in Fairborn, Ohio on May 2, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed from approximately 10:30 to 11:00 PM., The object moved from one point in the sky to another, stopped, and then moved again., The observer confirmed that the radar showed the object was real., The sighting lasted for 25-30 minutes., Although the sighting was clear, it's suggested that the object may not have been physically present.
